title: Communication
content: I always try to reach a mutual understanding and I take time to listen to what others have to say.

title: Transparence
content: I go straight to the point, speak the truth and I’m open about my intentions. I open source my work whenever I can.

title: Care
content: I want good for people and act for it. I share with my teammates and create things that not only users and customers would want but things that are also genuinely good for them.

title: Ownership
content: I want to own my work and the ways to do it as much as possible. With the liberties and responsibilities that come with it.

title: Quality
content: I care for the things I do. I want my work to be durable and made with long term thinking.

title: Simplicity
content: I strongly believe that less is more. I avoid unnecessary complexity for me, my teammates and users. Whatever I do I always ask myself “Can it be simpler ?”.
